price: Bu dünyada da peşlerine lanet taktık. Kıyamet günü de onlar, kötülenmiş/uzaklaştırılmış kimselerden olacaklardır.
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-atbaʿnāhum fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati hum mina al-maqbūḥīna
translations: And We caused to follow them
